1. Pyaar Ka Bandhan! Salman Khan Gives SRK A Hug While Watching Karan-Arjun & Fans Are Loosing It!
Last night, finally, the show premiered and fans were elated. With so many punches tickling audiences’ funny bones, Kapil Sharma was in a refreshed mood all set to rock again. Adding cherry on the cake were guests Ranveer Singh and Rohit Shetty who also had a blast.
2. ‘What A Comeback’! Fans Give A Big Thumbs Up To Kapil Sharma As He Returns With Season 2 Of His Show
So, spelling magic of their bromance once again, Salman Khan shared a video in which he can be seen watching Karan Arjun, their iconic movie together, with each other.
3. Ranveer Wants To Collaborate With Ranbir For ‘Andaz Apna Apna 2’ & We Just Can't Keep Calm!
“And yes, I would love to collaborate with Ranbir as he is one of my favourite actors. There have been several opportunities and I hope one of them in near future materializes. It will be a very enriching experience working with Ranbir,” he added.

4. A ‘Huge Advocate’ For LGBTQI Rights, Sonam Kapoor Hopes To See The World Without Labels One Day
"I'm a huge advocate for LGBTQI (Lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer and intersex). For me, it is one of the most important things that I fight for and I hope for when there is a country and a world without labels," Sonam said in a statement.
5. Deepika Initially Wanted An Open Relationship But Ended Up Falling For Ranveer in Six Months!
“I’d been in several relationships before and many times my trust was broken. When I met Ranveer, I was exhausted. I’ve never casually dated anyone. I’ve been in relationships since I was13. Now that I’m married I can say this. Whether it was one year, two years or three years, they were always proper relationships. It was always if you like someone you give it your hundred percent,” she told Filmfare.
title: Salman-SRK Watch Karan Arjun Together, Fans Give Big Thumbs Up To Kapil Sharma & More From Ent
